name: A. Boboniu Likes to Color Balls
statement:
Boboniu gives you r red balls, g green balls, b blue balls, w white
balls. He allows you to do the following operation as many times as you
want: Pick a red ball, a green ball, and a blue ball and then change
their color to white. You should answer if it’s possible to arrange all
the balls into a after several (possibly zero) number of described
operations.
